formula: a(n)=T(n,1), T(n,m)=m/n*sum(k=1..n, T(n-m,k)*2^(n-k)*binomial(n,k)), n>m, T(n,n)=2^n. [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Aug 08 2013]
prog: (Maxima) T(n,m):=if m=n then 2^m else m/n*sum(T(n-m,k)*2^(n-k)*binomial(n,k),k,1,n); makelist(T(n,1),n,1,15); [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Aug 08 2013]
author: _Christian G. Bower_
